title: Home Page
content:
ProcessMaker Tips ProcessMaker official documentation
Summary  Getting Started  Chapter 1 Getting Started A guide to setting up ProcessMaker
 Installation  Getting Started Install the ProcessMaker community edition Get the Business Process Automation with ProcessMaker 3.1: A Beginner’s Guide by Dipo Majekodunmi on Amazon  Javascript  Chapter 2 JavaScript Code snippets for the Dynaform controls
 Grid  Grid JavaScript snippets for Dynaform control: grid  Textbox  Textbox and Textarea JavaScript snippets for Dynaform control textbox and textarea  Trigger  Chapter 3 Triggers PHP snippets for ProcessMaker triggers  How To  Chapter 4 GENERAL GUIDE Some helpful links for ProcessMaker
 Insert Page Break in Outputdoc  Inserting Page Breaks in Output Document
 Filter and Sort Grid  Filter and Sort Grids This is a list of helpful links to help you with Dynaform Grids An answer on the ProcessMaker forum on how to set filtering on grids ProcessMaker wiki guide to using DataTables in ProcessMaker Sort grid by clicking header An answer on the ProcessMaker forum on how to use ParamQuery Sort grid by column  Tabs in Processmaker  How to create tabs in ProcessMaker Dynaform Medium article by Dipo Majekodunmi  Display Loading Effect  How to display loading effect in a Dynaform Medium article by Dipo Majekodunmi  Disable Form  How disable all the fields on the Dynaform $("form").find(".form-control").prop("disabled", true);  Hide Prev Next Button  How to hide the prev and next button on a Dynaform $("#dyn_backward").hide(); $("img[src='/images/bulletButtonLeft.gif']").hide(); $("#dyn_forward").hide(); $("img[src='/images/bulletButton.gif']").hide();  Libraries  Chapter 5 Libraries This is a list of helpful libraries for your ProcessMaker Dynaforms Sweetalert: makes popup messages easy and pretty. DataTables: adds advanced interaction controls to your HTML tables ParamQuery grid ParamQuery grid is the best open source jQuery grid plugin with enterprise features like row grouping, pivot, treegrid, column grouping, nesting, batch editing, export to multiple formats, selections, full keyboard navigation in addition to the basic features like sorting, filtering, paging, inline editing, validations, etc.
 Contribute to this documentation Feel free to update this content, just click the Edit this page link displayed on top right of each page, and pullrequest it

title: Libraries
content:
Chapter 5 Libraries This is a list of helpful libraries for your ProcessMaker Dynaforms
 Sweetalert: makes popup messages easy and pretty. DataTables: adds advanced interaction controls to your HTML tables ParamQuery grid   ParamQuery grid is the best open source jQuery grid plugin with enterprise features like row grouping, pivot, treegrid, column grouping, nesting, batch editing, export to multiple formats, selections, full keyboard navigation in addition to the basic features like sorting, filtering, paging, inline editing, validations, etc.

title: Filter and Sort Grid
content:
Filter and Sort Grids This is a list of helpful links to help you with Dynaform Grids
 An answer on the ProcessMaker forum on how to set filtering on grids ProcessMaker wiki guide to using DataTables in ProcessMaker Sort grid by clicking header An answer on the ProcessMaker forum on how to use ParamQuery Sort grid by column

title: Tabs in Processmaker
content: How to create tabs in ProcessMaker Dynaform Medium article by Dipo Majekodunmi

title: Display Loading Effect
content: How to display loading effect in a Dynaform Medium article by Dipo Majekodunmi

title: Disable Grid Column
content: Disable a grid column function disableGridColumn(gridId, gridColumnId) { let gridRows = $("#" + gridId).getNumberRows(); for (i = 1; i <= gridRows; i++) { $("#form\\[" + gridId + "\\]\\[" +i+ "\\]\\[" + gridColumnId + "\\]").attr("disabled", true); } }

title: Enable Grid Column
content: Enable a grid column function enableGridColumn(gridId, gridColumnId) { let gridRows = $("#" + gridId).getNumberRows(); for (i = 1; i <= gridRows; i++) { $("#form\\[" + gridId + "\\]\\[" +i+ "\\]\\[" + gridColumnId + "\\]").attr("disabled", false); } } function enableGridColumn(gridId, gridColumnId) { let numberOfGrid = $("#" + gridId).getNumberRows(); for (let index = 1; index <= numberOfGrid; index++) { $("#" + gridId).find("#"+ gridId +"-body").find("#form\\["+ gridId +"\\]\\[" + index + "\\]\\["+ gridColumnId +"\\]").prop("disabled", false); } }

title: Is Grid Column Empty?
content: Check if a Grid column is empty function isGridColumnEmpty (gridId, rowNo, columnNo) { if (!($("#" + gridId).getValue(rowNo, columnNo) != '')) { return [false, columnNo]; } return [true, columnNo]; }

title: Show Grid Column
content: Show a grid column function showGridColumn(gridId, index) { $("#" + gridId).showColumn(index); $("#" + gridId).enableValidation(index); }

title: Hide Grid Column
content: Hide a grid column function hideGridColumn(gridId, index) { $("#" + gridId).hideColumn(index); $("#" + gridId).disableValidation(index); }

title: Clear Grid
content: Clear a grid function clearGrid(gridId) { return $("#" + gridId ).clear(); }

title: Allow Only Numbers in Textbox
content: Allow only numbers in textbox function allowOnlyNumbers(elementid){ $("#" + elementid).getControl().keypress( function() { $(this).val($(this).val().replace(/[^\d].+/, "")); if ((event.which < 48 || event.which > 57)) { event.preventDefault(); } }); }

title: Disable Textbox
content: Disable textbox function disableElement(elementId) { $("#" + elementId).attr('disabled', 'disabled'); }

title: Enable Textbox
content: Enable textbox function enableElement(elementId) { $("#" + elementId).removeAttr('disabled'); }

title: Get Textbox Value
content: Get the value of a textbox function fetchValue(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).getValue(); }

title: Check if Texbox Is Equal
content: Check if the value of two textboxes are the same function isSame(element1, element2) { let val1 = $("#" + element1).getValue(); let val2 = $("#" + element2).getValue(); return (val1 == val2); }

title: Assign Value to Textbox
content: Assign a value to a textbox function assignValue(elementid, value) { return $("#" + elementid).setValue(value); }

title: Show and Assign to Textbox
content: Show and assign a value to a textbox function showandAssignValue(element, value) { return $('#' + element).show().setValue(value); }

title: Disable Textbox Validation
content: Disable validation on textbox function unrequireElement(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).disableValidation(); }  You have to make the form control required in order to be able to disableValidation dynamically

title: Enable Textbox Validation
content: Enable validation on textbox function requireElement(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).enableValidation(); }  You have to make the form control required in order to be able to enableValidation dynamically

title: Hide Multiple Fields
content: Hide multiple form fields //this accepts an array of textbox ids function hideMultipleElements(arrInput) { arrInput.forEach(hideElementId); function hideElementId(item, index) { return $("#" + item ).hide(); } }

title: Show Multiple Fields
content: Show multiple form fields //this accepts an array of textbox ids function showMultipleElements(arrInput) { arrInput.forEach(showElementId); function showElementId(item, index) { return $("#" + item ).show(); } }

title: Hide Textbox
content: Hide a form field function hideElement(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).disableValidation().hide(); }

title: Show Textbox
content: Show textbox function showElement(elementid, validate = "no") { if (validate == "yes") return $("#" + elementid).enableValidation().show(); return $("#" + elementid).show(); }

title: Check if Empty
content: Check if a form field is empty function isEmpty(elementid) { if($("#" + elementid).getValue() == '' ) return true; return false; }

title: Empty Textbox
content: Empty a textbox field function setEmpty(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).setValue(''); }

title: Disable Grid
content: Disable a grid function disableGrid(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).find("input,button,textarea,select").attr("disabled", true); }

title: Disable Form
content: How disable all the fields on the Dynaform $("form").find(".form-control").prop("disabled", true);

title: Hide Prev Next Button
content: How to hide the prev and next button on a Dynaform $("#dyn_backward").hide(); $("img[src='/images/bulletButtonLeft.gif']").hide(); $("#dyn_forward").hide(); $("img[src='/images/bulletButton.gif']").hide();
